Title: ASP.NET validators controls with error messages in bootstrap tooltip or popover
Description: ASP.NET validators controls with error messages in bootstrap tooltip or popover components.
HomeWiki:
This solution allows ASP.NET validators to show yours errors messages inside a Bootstrap Tootip or Popover

Download the solution 1.1 and enjoy

The solution 1.1 has all prerequisites implemented.
  • The prerequisites are: Jquery, attrchange plugin, Use hidden ValidationSumaries
  • Ennhancements of last version
  1. Supports multiple asp.net Validator Groups.
  2. Supports all types of ASP.NET Validator Controls.
  3. You can replace the Bootstrap Tooltip by Popover component.
  1. The error message must be unique for each asp.net Validador Control which belongs a same Validator Group.
